useDashboardPreferences
hooks.description: Load preferences from localStorage on mount
hooks.returnType:
{
    preferences,
    isLoaded,
    updatePreferences,
    resetPreferences,
    toggleCarouselMode,
    toggleAutoPlay,
    setAutoPlayInterval,
    addFavoriteComponent,
    removeFavoriteComponent,
    setLastViewedComponent
  }
